title: Sengarattan Paaraiyula Lyrics Sandakozhi 2 Tamil Movie
stanzas:
Sengarattan Paraiyula
sittodhungum velaiyila
akkurama paakkuriye
ekka vittu thookuriye

akkurama paakkuriye
thanne naanaane
ekka vittu thookuriye
thanne naanaane
konjamum nalla illa
thanne nannaane
thanne nannaane
thanne nannaane

maanang karukkayila
maaraapu koraikayila
aaru nuraikaiyila
aadu rendu verikkaiyila
nenjukulla jinjinukkaa
thanne nannaane
manjanathi maram sirikkum
thanne nannaane
aamaa
manjanathi maram sirikkum
thanne nannaane

kodaiyila kozhi kuththa
paakkum muzhi pacha kutha
suthi muthi yaarum illa
othukittaa kitta vaaren

suthi muthum yaarumilla
thanne nannaane
nee othukitta kitta varren
thanne nannaane
mutham thaaren mutham thaaren
thanne nannaane

oada ozhungayile
kaada odhungayile
visil adichu koopputtaakaa
vegu peru paappaangannu
usura vittu kooputtene
ullukulla ketkalaiyaa

usura vittu kooputtene
thanne nannaane
un ullukulla ketkalaiyaa
